task.summary: Default task
Merged master for
Added a drive status textview, updated only upon adding a drink.
Added a delayed task to update periodically the drive status. Connected weight to the drinker.
Connected sex to drinker.
Set versionName to 0.0.1
Added versionName to main activity
Fixed mistakes following app renaming path.
Rearranged main activity layout
Introduced Navigation component and splitted the app into fragments.
Locked orientation, hidden keyboard and "resized soft input mode".
Changed buttons to foating buttons
Corrected orientation lock (and tested...).
Reworked gradle scripts to execute unit tests.
Remvode stacktrace option from unit tests on CI.
Corrected intentionnal error to check CI settings.
Fixed #10 : refined past drink layout & colors.
Changed text by icons and reworked layout.

Added transition on fragment navigation.
Still some unwanted brutal disappearance on leaving a popped fragment.
Fixed erroneous transitions (pop enter/exit special meaning).

Added the drink removal function.
This required to rework the drinker data hosting, now in a singleton repository (not great, to improve later, see #42).
A temporary implementation used a view model, but it was removed as of little use and redundant. The dependencies were kept though (see #43)
Fixed #38
Add Room dependencies (kotlin with coroutines).

Persist user drinks.
Still work in progress, dates incorrectly saved.

Save ingestion time.
A default null case was considered, inhibiting memorization of ingestion time.
Move persistence files in data folder

Use sharedPreferences for user's weight and sex.
Calls are done in : - MainActivity for reading previous values. - DrinkerFragment for updates to values.

Force user on drinkerFragment until initialized.
Initialization is triggered by the valid click. A code-handled navigation happens then (to popTo drinkerFragment instead of driveFragment).

Add pickers as inputs to add a drink.
EditTexts are still used beneath to gather values on validation.

Add pickers as inputs for drinker fragment.
Previous editText and radio buttons removed.
Remove editText for adding a drink.
Lowered splash screen to 1s
Clean up following code analysis.

Translate for en + fr.
Fixes #41
